subject: rubber stiffnes
description_text:
hello

i bought the simsonn plus x pedals, i really impressed on this pedals, but
and what i notice the rubbers are really stiff, even the softer (red ones)
are pretty hard when i press them
and i can manage to put 40kg and pressing really hard... is that normal?  i
have default settings on them. (was looking some reviews on youtube and
what i notice people squeezed them really easier

best regards
Andrej

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrej Vojvoda,  If you find the red damping too stiff, you can remove the 10mm limiter spacer on the brake pedal’s black spring to increase the pedal travel. After this adjustment, please recalibrate the pedal; full compression of the damping is not required. For detailed instructions, please refer to the manual.
